info.title: Deribit API - Market Data
info.description: Deribit API specification for Market Data endpoints

parameters.description: The instrument name for which to retrieve the order book, see [`public/get_instruments`](#public-get_instruments) to obtain instrument names.
parameters.name: instrument_name

parameters.description: The number of entries to return for bids and asks, maximum - `10000`.
parameters.name: depth

get.description: Retrieves the order book, along with other market values for a given instrument.

parameters.description: The instrument ID for which to retrieve the order book, see [`public/get_instruments`](#public-get_instruments) to obtain instrument IDs.
parameters.name: instrument_id

parameters.description: The number of entries to return for bids and asks, maximum - `10000`.
parameters.name: depth

get.description: Retrieves the order book, along with other market values for a given instrument ID.

Settlement type

count

The latest timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch)

get.description: Retrieves historical settlement, delivery and bankruptcy events coming from all instruments within a given currency.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency symbol

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Instrument kind, if not provided instruments of all kinds are considered

get.description: Retrieves the summary information such as open interest, 24h volume, etc. for all instruments for the currency (optionally filtered by kind). **Note** - For real-time updates, we recommend using the WebSocket subscription to `ticker.{instrument_name}.{interval}` instead of polling this endpoint.

parameters.name: instrument_name
parameters.description: Instrument name

get.description: Retrieves the summary information such as open interest, 24h volume, etc. for a specific instrument.

parameters.name: instrument_name
parameters.description: Instrument name
Settlement type
parameters.name: type
count
parameters.description: Number of requested items, default - `20`, maximum - `1000`

parameters.name: continuation
parameters.description: Continuation token for pagination
The latest timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch)
parameters.name: search_start_timestamp

get.description: Retrieves historical public settlement, delivery and bankruptcy events filtered by instrument name.
Retrieves contract size of provided instrument.

parameters.name: instrument_name
parameters.description: Instrument name

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: Request for extended statistics. Including also 7 and 30 days volumes (default false)

get.description: Retrieves aggregated 24h trade volumes for different instrument types and currencies.

parameters.name: index_name
parameters.description: Index identifier, matches (base) cryptocurrency with quote currency

get.description: Retrieves the current index price value for given index name.
Retrieves the identifiers of all supported Price Indexes

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: When set to `true`, returns additional information including `future_combo_creation_enabled` and `option_combo_creation_enabled` for each index

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of a cryptocurrency price index

get.description: Retrieves the identifiers of all supported Price Indexes

Retrieves available trading instruments. This method can be used to see which instruments are available for trading, or which instruments have recently expired. **Note - This endpoint has distinct API rate limiting requirements:** 1 request per 10 seconds, with a burst of 5. To avoid rate limits, we recommend using either the REST requests for server-cached data or the WebSocket subscription to [instrument_state.{kind}.{currency}](https://docs.deribit.com/#instrument-state-kind-currency) for real-time updates. For more information, see [Rate Limits](https://support.deribit.com/hc/en-us/articles/25944617523357-Rate-Limits).

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency symbol or `"any"` for all

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Instrument kind, if not provided instruments of all kinds are considered

parameters.name: expired
parameters.description: Set to true to show recently expired instruments instead of active ones.

get.description: Retrieves information about instrument

parameters.name: instrument_name
parameters.description: Instrument name

get.description: Provides information about historical volatility for given cryptocurrency.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency symbol

get.description: Retrieves hourly historical interest rate for requested PERPETUAL instrument.

parameters.name: instrument_name
parameters.description: Instrument name

parameters.name: start_timestamp
parameters.description: The earliest timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch)

parameters.name: end_timestamp
parameters.description: The most recent timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch)

get.description: Retrieves interest rate value for requested period. Applicable only for PERPETUAL instruments.

parameters.name: instrument_name
parameters.description: Instrument name

parameters.name: start_timestamp
parameters.description: The earliest timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch)

parameters.name: end_timestamp
parameters.description: The most recent timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch)

parameters.name: instrument_name
parameters.description: Instrument name

parameters.name: start_timestamp
parameters.description: The earliest timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch)

parameters.name: end_timestamp
parameters.description: The most recent timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch)

get.description: Public request for 5min history of markprice values for the instrument. For now the markprice history is available only for a subset of options which take part in the volatility index calculations. All other instruments, futures and perpetuals will return an empty list.
Retrieves expirations for instruments. This method can be used to see instruments's expirations.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency symbol or `"any"` for all or '"grouped"' for all grouped by currency

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Instrument kind, `"future"` or `"option"` or `"any"`

parameters.name: currency_pair
parameters.description: The currency pair symbol

get.description: Retrieves historical APR data for specified currency. Only applicable to yield-generating tokens (`USDE`, `STETH`, `USDC`, `BUILD`). ** Related Support Article:** [Yield reward-bearing coins](https://support.deribit.com/hc/en-us/articles/26525792475677-Yield-reward-bearing-coins)

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency for which to retrieve APR history

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of days to retrieve (default `365`, maximum `365`)

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Used to receive APR history before given epoch day

parameters.name: instrument_name
parameters.description: Instrument name

parameters.name: start_seq
parameters.description: The sequence number of the first trade to be returned

parameters.name: end_seq
parameters.description: The sequence number of the last trade to be returned

parameters.name: start_timestamp
parameters.description: The earliest timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch). When param is provided trades are returned from the earliest

parameters.name: end_timestamp
parameters.description: The most recent timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch). Only one of params: start_timestamp, end_timestamp is truly required

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of requested items, default - `10`, maximum - `1000`

parameters.name: sorting
parameters.description: Direction of results sorting (`default` value means no sorting, results will be returned in order in which they left the database)

get.description: Retrieve the latest trades that have occurred for a specific instrument.

parameters.name: instrument_name
parameters.description: Instrument name

parameters.name: start_timestamp
parameters.description: The earliest timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch). When param is provided trades are returned from the earliest

parameters.name: end_timestamp
parameters.description: The most recent timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch). Only one of params: start_timestamp, end_timestamp is truly required

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of requested items, default - `10`, maximum - `1000`

parameters.name: sorting
parameters.description: Direction of results sorting (`default` value means no sorting, results will be returned in order in which they left the database)

get.description: Retrieve the latest trades that have occurred for a specific instrument and within a given time range.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency symbol

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Instrument kind, `"combo"` for any combo or `"any"` for all. If not provided instruments of all kinds are considered

parameters.name: start_id
parameters.description: The ID of the first trade to be returned. Number for BTC trades, or hyphen name in ex. `"ETH-15"` # `"ETH_USDC-16"`

parameters.name: end_id
parameters.description: The ID of the last trade to be returned. Number for BTC trades, or hyphen name in ex. `"ETH-15"` # `"ETH_USDC-16"`

parameters.name: start_timestamp
parameters.description: The earliest timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch). When param is provided trades are returned from the earliest

parameters.name: end_timestamp
parameters.description: The most recent timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch). Only one of params: start_timestamp, end_timestamp is truly required

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of requested items, default - `10`, maximum - `1000`

parameters.name: sorting
parameters.description: Direction of results sorting (`default` value means no sorting, results will be returned in order in which they left the database)

get.description: Retrieve the latest trades that have occurred for instruments in a specific currency symbol.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency symbol

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: Instrument kind, `"combo"` for any combo or `"any"` for all. If not provided instruments of all kinds are considered

parameters.name: start_timestamp
parameters.description: The earliest timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch). When param is provided trades are returned from the earliest

parameters.name: end_timestamp
parameters.description: The most recent timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch). Only one of params: start_timestamp, end_timestamp is truly required

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of requested items, default - `10`, maximum - `1000`

parameters.name: sorting
parameters.description: Direction of results sorting (`default` value means no sorting, results will be returned in order in which they left the database)

get.description: Retrieve the latest trades that have occurred for instruments in a specific currency symbol and within a given time range.
Retrieves all cryptocurrencies supported by the API.

parameters.name: instrument_name
parameters.description: Instrument name

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Specifies time period. `8h` - 8 hours, `24h` - 24 hours, `1m` - 1 month

get.description: Retrieve the list of the latest PERPETUAL funding chart points within a given time period.

parameters.name: instrument_name
parameters.description: Instrument name

parameters.name: start_timestamp
parameters.description: The earliest timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch)

parameters.name: end_timestamp
parameters.description: The most recent timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch)

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: Chart bars resolution given in full minutes or keyword `1D` (only some specific resolutions are supported)

get.description: Publicly available market data used to generate a TradingView candle chart.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency symbol

parameters.name: start_timestamp
parameters.description: The earliest timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch)

parameters.name: end_timestamp
parameters.description: The most recent timestamp to return result from (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch)

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: Time resolution given in full seconds or keyword `1D` (only some specific resolutions are supported)

get.description: Public market data request for volatility index candles.
Get ticker for an instrument.

parameters.name: instrument_name
parameters.description: Instrument name

parameters.name: index_name
parameters.description: Index identifier, matches (base) cryptocurrency with quote currency

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset for pagination, default - `0`

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of requested items, default - `10`, maximum - `1000`

get.description: Retrieves delivery prices for then given index

kind_with_combo_all.description: Instrument kind: `"future"`, `"option"`, `"spot"`, `"future_combo"`, `"option_combo"`, `"combo"` for any combo or `"any"` for all

currency_with_any.description: Currency name or `"any"` if don't care

settlement_currency_with_any_and_grouped.description: Currency name or `"any"` if don't care or `"grouped"` if grouped by currencies

timestamp.description: The timestamp (milliseconds since the Unix epoch)

index_name.description: Index identifier, matches (base) cryptocurrency with quote currency

id.description: The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request

future_combo_creation_enabled.description: Whether future combo creation is enabled for this index (only present when `extended`=`true`)

option_combo_creation_enabled.description: Whether option combo creation is enabled for this index (only present when `extended`=`true`)

id.description: The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request

estimated_delivery_price.description: Estimated delivery price for the market. For more details, see Documentation > General > Expiration Price

id.description: The id that was sent in the request

data.description: Candles as an array of arrays with 5 values each. The inner values correspond to the timestamp in ms, open, high, low, and close values of the volatility index correspondingly.

continuation.description: Continuation - to be used as the `end_timestamp` parameter on the next request. `NULL` when no continuation.

id.description: The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request

result.description: Markprice history values as an array of arrays with 2 values each. The inner values correspond to the timestamp in ms and the markprice itself.

id.description: The id that was sent in the request

ticks.description: Values of the time axis given in milliseconds since UNIX epoch

volume.description: List of volume bars (in base currency, one per candle)

cost.description: List of cost bars (volume in quote currency, one per candle)

open.description: List of prices at open (one per candle)

close.description: List of prices at close (one per candle)

high.description: List of highest price levels (one per candle)

low.description: List of lowest price levels (one per candle)

id.description: The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request
The id that was sent in the request

calls_volume.description: Total 24h trade volume for call options.

puts_volume.description: Total 24h trade volume for put options.

calls_volume_7d.description: Total 7d trade volume for call options.

puts_volume_7d.description: Total 7d trade volume for put options.

calls_volume_30d.description: Total 30d trade volume for call options.

puts_volume_30d.description: Total 30d trade volume for put options.

contract_size.description: Contract size, for futures in USD, for options in base currency of the instrument (BTC, ETH, ...)

date.description: The event date with year, month and day

funding.description: funding (in base currency ; settlement for perpetual product only)

index_price.description: underlying index price at time of event (in quote currency; settlement and delivery only)

mark_price.description: mark price for at the settlement time (in quote currency; settlement and delivery only)

position.description: position size (in quote currency; settlement and delivery only)

profit_loss.description: profit and loss (in base currency; settlement and delivery only)

session_bankruptcy.description: value of session bankruptcy (in base currency; bankruptcy only)

session_profit_loss.description: total value of session profit and losses (in base currency)

session_tax.description: total amount of paid taxes/fees (in base currency; bankruptcy only)

session_tax_rate.description: rate of paid taxes/fees (in base currency; bankruptcy only)

socialized.description: the amount of the socialized losses (in base currency; bankruptcy only)

ErrorResponse.description: Generic error response for broken references

settlement_currency.description: Optional (not added for spot). Settlement currency for the instrument.

quote_currency.description: The currency in which the instrument prices are quoted.

min_trade_amount.description: Minimum amount for trading. For perpetual and inverse futures the amount is in USD units. For options and linear futures and it is the underlying base currency coin.

is_active.description: Indicates if the instrument can currently be traded.

settlement_period.description: Optional (not added for spot). The settlement period.

creation_timestamp.description: The time when the instrument was first created (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch).

tick_size.description: Specifies minimal price change and, as follows, the number of decimal places for instrument prices.

expiration_timestamp.description: The time when the instrument will expire (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch).

future_type.description: Future type (only for futures)(field is deprecated and will be removed in the future, `instrument_type` should be used instead).

max_liquidation_commission.description: Maximal liquidation trade commission for instrument (only for futures).

block_trade_tick_size.description: Specifies minimal price change for block trading.

max_leverage.description: Maximal leverage for instrument (only for futures).

index_price.description: Index Price at the moment of trade

amount.description: Trade amount. For perpetual and inverse futures the amount is in USD units. For options and linear futures and it is the underlying base currency coin.

contracts.description: Trade size in contract units (optional, may be absent in historical trades)

iv.description: Option implied volatility for the price (Option only)

liquidation.description: Optional field (only for trades caused by liquidation): `"M"` when maker side of trade was under liquidation, `"T"` when taker side was under liquidation, `"MT"` when both sides of trade were under liquidation

mark_price.description: Mark Price at the moment of trade

combo_id.description: Optional field containing combo instrument name if the trade is a combo trade

combo_trade_id.description: Optional field containing combo trade identifier if the trade is a combo trade

block_rfq_id.description: ID of the Block RFQ - when trade was part of the Block RFQ

delivery_price.description: The settlement price for the instrument. Only when `state = closed`

expirations.description: A map where each key is valid currency (e.g. btc, eth, usdc), and the value is a list of expirations or a map where each key is a valid kind (future or options) and value is a list of expirations from every instrument

withdrawal_fee.description: The total transaction fee paid for withdrawals

min_withdrawal_fee.description: The minimum transaction fee paid for withdrawals

currency.description: The abbreviation of the currency. This abbreviation is used elsewhere in the API to identify the currency.

currency_long.description: The full name for the currency.

min_confirmations.description: Minimum number of block chain confirmations before deposit is accepted.

in_cross_collateral_pool.description: `true` if the currency is part of the cross collateral pool

apr.description: Simple Moving Average (SMA) of the last 7 days of rewards. If fewer than 7 days of reward data are available, the APR is calculated as the average of the available rewards. Only applicable to yield-generating tokens (`USDE`, `STETH`, `USDC`, `BUILD`).

decimals.description: The number of decimal places for the currency

low.description: Price of the 24h lowest trade, `null` if there weren't any trades

volume.description: The total 24h traded volume (in base currency)

bid_price.description: The current best bid price, `null` if there aren't any bids

ask_price.description: The current best ask price, `null` if there aren't any asks

mid_price.description: The average of the best bid and ask, `null` if there aren't any asks or bids

last.description: The price of the latest trade, `null` if there weren't any trades

open_interest.description: Optional (only for derivatives). The total amount of outstanding contracts in the corresponding amount units. For perpetual and inverse futures the amount is in USD units. For options and linear futures and it is the underlying base currency coin.

estimated_delivery_price.description: Optional (only for derivatives). Estimated delivery price for the market. For more details, see Contract Specification > General Documentation > Expiration Price.

volume_notional.description: Volume in quote currency (futures and spots only)

interest_rate.description: Interest rate used in implied volatility calculations (options only)

underlying_index.description: Name of the underlying future, or `'index_price'` (options only)

underlying_price.description: underlying price for implied volatility calculations (options only)

price_change.description: 24-hour price change expressed as a percentage, `null` if there weren't any trades

trade_timestamp.description: The timestamp of the trade (milliseconds since the UNIX epoch)

currency_with_any_and_grouped.description: Currency name or `"any"` if don't care or `"grouped"` if grouped by currencies

price_index.description: Name of price index that is used for this instrument

trade_seq.description: The sequence number of the trade within instrument

block_trade_id_in_result.description: Block trade id - when trade was part of a block trade

above_price.description: The price from which the increased tick size applies

tick_size.description: Tick size to be used above the price. It must be multiple of the minimum tick size.

tick_direction.description: Direction of the "tick" (`0` = Plus Tick, `1` = Zero-Plus Tick, `2` = Minus Tick, `3` = Zero-Minus Tick).

mark_iv.description: (Only for option) implied volatility for mark price

block_trade_leg_count.description: Block trade leg count - when trade was part of a block trade

id.description: The id that was sent in the request

result.description: Result of method execution. `ok` in case of success
